verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6458>"Cut<s%> out for yourself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> like the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>ones,<s%> and I will <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were on the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7665>shattered.<s%>

"So be <S%H3559>ready<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H5324>present<s%> <S%H5324>yourself<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to Me on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"And <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is to <S%H5927>come<s%> up with you, <S%H408>nor<s%> let <S%H1571>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>anywhere<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and the <S%H1241>herds<s%> may not <S%H7462>graze<s%> in <S%H4136>front<s%> of that <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

So he <S%H6458>cut<s%> out <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> like the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>ones,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with him as he <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by in <S%H6440>front<s%> of him and <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H7349>compassionate<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abounding<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth;<s%>

who <S%H5341>keeps<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> for <S%H505>thousands,<s%> who <S%H5375>forgives<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and <S%H2403>sin;<s%> yet He will by <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>leave<s%> [the guilty] <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of fathers on the <S%H1>children<s%> and on the <S%H1121>grandchildren<s%> to the <S%H1121>third<s%> and <S%H8029>fourth<s%> generations. "
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H4116>made<s%> <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H6915>bow<s%> <S%H6915>low<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H7812>worship.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> along in our <S%H7130>midst,<s%> <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> are so <S%H7186>obstinate<s%><S%H6203>;<s%> and do Thou <S%H5545>pardon<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and our <S%H9128>sin,<s%> and <S%H5157>take<s%> us as Thine own <S%H5157>possession.<s%>"

Then God <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant.<s%> <S%H5048>Before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> I will <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H6381>miracles<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not been <S%H1254>produced<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> among <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you live will <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>working<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for it is a <S%H3372>fearful<s%> <S%H3372>thing<s%> that I am going to <S%H6213>perform<s%> with you.

"Be sure to <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you this <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

<S%H8104>"Watch<s%> yourself that you <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H6435>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H935>going,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> it <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst.<s%>

"But [rather,] you are to <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> and <S%H7665>smash<s%> their [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim<s%>

– for you shall not <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>any<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H410>god,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7067>Jealous,<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> –

<S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and they <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and someone <S%H7121>invite<s%> you to <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%>

and you <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and cause your <S%H1121>sons<s%> [also] to <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourself <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

"You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread.<s%> For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you are to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib,<s%> for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"The <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>offspring<s%> from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> belongs to Me, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> the <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>offspring<s%> from <S%H7794>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> the <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>offspring<s%> from a <S%H2543>donkey;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> [it,] then you shall <S%H6202>break<s%> its <S%H6202>neck.<s%> You shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born of your <S%H1121>sons.<s%> And <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me empty-handed.

"You shall <S%H5647>work<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest;<s%> [even] during <S%H2758>plowing<s%> <S%H2758>time<s%> and <S%H7105>harvest<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H7620>Weeks,<s%> [that is,] the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H614>Ingathering<s%> at the <S%H8622>turn<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

<S%H7969>"Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2138>males<s%> are to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For I will <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you and <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>borders,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%> when you <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H7819>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of My <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H2557>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> is the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to be <S%H3885>left<s%> <S%H3885>over<s%> until <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

"You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the very <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>soil<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in its mother's <S%H2461>milk.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>"Write<s%> <S%H3789>down<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> for in <S%H5921>accordance<s%> <S%H6310><s%> with <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you and with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So he was <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> he did not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> the <S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H1697>Commandments.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> (and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> [were] in <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H3027>hand<s%> as he was <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>), that Moses did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%> because of his <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with Him.

So when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone,<s%> and they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> him.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to them, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> and he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them [to do] <S%H3605>everything<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with them, he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

But whenever <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with Him, he would <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%> the <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H3318>came<s%> out; and whenever he <S%H3318>came<s%> out and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he had been <S%H6680>commanded,<s%>

the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone.<s%> So Moses would <S%H7725>replace<s%> the <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with Him.
